TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpacityConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: Provides a type converter to convert opacity values to and from a string.

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert opacity values to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您無法直接建立的執行個體。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 請改為呼叫方法類別。Instead, you call the method of class. 如需詳細資訊，關於類型轉換器，並檢視程式碼範例，請參閱基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters and to view code examples, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法專門用來轉換值代表其對應的百分比或小數代表的不透明度百分比的值。The method is specialized to convert values that represent percentages or decimal fractions to their corresponding values, which represent the opacity as a percentage. 以外的類型會傳遞至這個方法的基底類別實作。Types other than are passed to the base class implementation of this method.

span.span: could not be properly converted to type .

exception.span: -or- The resulting converted was less than zero percent or greater than one hundred percent.

span.span: -or- The resulting converted was less than zero percent or greater than one hundred percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法專門將整數值轉換為其百分比表示。The method is specialized to convert integral values to their percentage representations. 其他類型會傳遞至這個方法的基底類別實作。Other types are passed to the base class implementation of this method.
